about.title: About Me
about.desc: Professional transitioning to Artificial Intelligence, with solid experience in systems analysis and technical support.
about.trajetoria: Graduated in Information Systems, currently pursuing a postgraduate degree in Applied Artificial Intelligence at SENAI/SC. My experience as a Systems and Support Analyst has given me a solid foundation in problem solving, data analysis and technical solution development.
about.motivacao: I am driven by technical challenges and the opportunity to apply technology strategically, especially in data-driven solutions, Web3, financial markets and distributed systems.
